label: def-cloning-operator-continuity-coeffs-recorrected
name: Cloning Operator Continuity Coefficients
natural_language_statement: This defines the three state-dependent coefficients that appear in the continuity bound for the Cloning Transition Operator.
description: These coefficients break down the error propagation through the cloning operator. The Lipschitz factor captures linear error propagation, the HÃ¶lder factor captures complex non-linearities arising from status changes, and the stochastic offset represents the baseline noise inherent to the operator.
formal_statement: The coefficients in the continuity bound for the Cloning Transition Operator are: ...
